content: CREATE TABLE data_table (id int, name varchar(20);INSERT INTO data_table (id, name)  VALUES (1, "Jane"),         (2, "John");UPDATE data_tableSET name = "Jake"WHERE id = 2;SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT act_id)  FROM Activity_log;SELECT act_name, MAX(Activity.act_cal)  FROM Activity_log  LEFT JOIN Activity  ON Activity_log.act_id = Activity.act_id  WHERE log_timestamp  LIKE "20170215%";  SELECT SUM(duration)  FROM Activity_log  WHERE log_timestamp  LIKE "20170215%"  AND act_id = "1"  ORDER BY column_name ASC\DESC;
